name: @mypreview/html-boilerplate
description: Simple boilerplate for building web app with babel-cli and sass.
author: MyPreview

scripts.build: cross-env BABEL_ENV=default NODE_ENV=production npm run format && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run copy:resources
scripts.build:css: rimraf build/css/* && npm run lint:css && sass src/scss/style.scss build/css/style.min.css --style=compressed --no-source-map
scripts.build:js: rimraf build/js/* && npm run lint:js && babel src/js/script.js --out-file build/js/script.min.js && terser --compress --mangle --output build/js/script.min.js -- build/js/script.min.js
scripts.copy:resources: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:static
scripts.watch: concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:html"
